quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience. – Eleanor Roosevelt
fact: Bullet proof vests, fire escapes, windshield wipers, and laser printers were all invented by women
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I remember when I was a kid, I opened my fridge and noticed one of my vegetables were crying. I guess I have some emotional cabbage.
